## DefaultLogger.(constructor)

Create new logger service instance.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(format: string, extraVars?: {
        [key: string]: MessageVariable;
    });
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  format | <code>string</code> | The log message format string. |
|  extraVars | <code>{</code><br/><code>        [key: string]: MessageVariable;</code><br/><code>    }</code> | Implementation for additional log message variables that can be used in the <code>format</code> string. |
